name: Slot
title: Slot
description: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments.

elements.name: Slot
elements.description: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments.

elements.name: serviceCategory
elements.description: A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.

elements.name: serviceType
elements.description: The type of appointments that can be booked into this slot (ideally this would be an identifiable service - which is at a location, rather than the location itself).

elements.name: specialty
elements.description: The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment.

elements.name: appointmentType
elements.description: The style of appointment or patient that may be booked in the slot (not service type).

elements.name: schedule
elements.description: The schedule resource that this slot defines an interval of status information.

elements.name: start
elements.description: Date/Time that the slot is to begin.

elements.name: end
elements.description: Date/Time that the slot is to conclude.

elements.name: overbooked
elements.description: This slot has already been overbooked, appointments are unlikely to be accepted for this time.

elements.name: comment
elements.description: Comments on the slot to describe any extended information.
